doc.title: Fearless
doc.plot: When the lives of teen body boarders and beach volleyball players come together for a beach sports competition in Hawaii, everything seemed perfect in the island paradise. Complications swiftly arise in the way of a budding romance and consequences from tragic events. Friendship, jealousy, commitment, loyalty and character are all put to the test as a dark current flows into their lives and relationships. Two young people find themselves having to grow up fast and figure out which path they wish to set for the rest of their lives. And they must learn what it means to be Fearless.
